item.description: Key Rotation in KMS # KMS Key Use in RDS/Secrets Manager: The KMS key encrypts the RDS credentials before they are stored in Secrets Manager. Access Control: Access to the decrypted secret is controlled by AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies. You need appropriate permissions both to access the secret in Secrets Manager and to use the associated KMS key for decryption. Transparency for the User: The decryption process is designed to be transparent to the user.
